Godannar

Gundam wing

Daitarn 3

Big O

Dancouga

Macross

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af8247636872658fd70100#post_54af8247636872658fd70100
The thing that Tips things to the EVA's favor is that they have Barriers. Even when they're not berserk. (In the original show, Only things with A.T fields can break through them, But in SRW Games, It just takes *A lot* of force) And when they're not berserk they have guns with Kaiju sized bullets. (Which are a lot more effective than missiles)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af8247636872658fd70100#post_54af8247636872658fd70100
From what I can remember, Anything the Jaegar's can do, The EVAs can do fine. Maybe even better. (Chain sword? Progressive knife. Artillery? Giant guns. Rocket fist? No, But they're still pretty good at melee before they go berserk.)
